name: Lazer Fight
description:
This is by far my biggest project yet. Lots of time and code went into it compared to my other projects. I started from what the gun fight lesson module showed me and it just splayed out from there. I gave it new colors, new animations, and even a health and reload mechanic. I'm so proud of what I was able to make. I will have a blog post in the coming week over on my portfolio webpage so you can see how everything was made:

https://jacoblince8.wixsite.com/thejlzone

Have fun Space Cowboy.

Outlaw:

Movement-w=up a=left s=down d=right

Shoot with spacebar

Sheriff:

Movment-(use numpad keys) 8=up 4=left 5=down 6=right

Shoot with down Arrow key
